sections.content:

Table content:
Hardware | PCI/USB ID | Working?
Touchpad |  | Yes
Keyboard |  | Yes
GPU (Intel) | 8086:9a60 | Yes
GPU (NVIDIA) | 10de:25b8 | Yes
Webcam | 04f2:b6be | Yes
Ethernet | 8086:15f3 | Yes
Bluetooth | 8086:2725 | Yes

Wi-Fi | 8086:2725 | Yes
Fingerprint reader | 06cb:00bd | Yes
TPM |  | Untested

sections.title: Installation
sections.content: In the UEFI setup, turn off "OS-Optimized defaults" and "Secure Boot".

sections.title: Accessibility
sections.content:
Note: **This article or section needs expansion.** This article or section needs expansion.

This article or section needs expansion.

There is an option to change the UEFI from GUI mode to text mode, which may be useful.

sections.title: Audio
sections.content: Install Sound Open Firmware to support the audio card.

sections.title: Video
sections.content: The nouveau kernel module is used by default, but is unusable. Install the proprietary NVIDIA driver. See NVIDIA Optimus for setup details. Note that the video output ports are hardwired to the NVIDIA GPU.

sections.title: Wi-Fi
sections.content: If the Intel AX210 Wi-Fi card is slow, write options iwlwifi 11n_disable=8 power_save=0 to /etc/modprobe.d/iwlwifi.conf.
